# morpheus_contact (Data Source)

Provides a Morpheus contact data source.

## Example Usage

```terraform
data "morpheus_contact" "example" {
  name = "example contact"
}
```

## Schema

### Optional

- **id** (Number) The ID of this resource.
- **name** (String) The name of the Morpheus contact.
